Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lankshire Parkway, north of Overland Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Lankshire Parkway runs south towards the Overland Drive intersection. On the east side, you can still see tha large Necropolis looming in the darkness. On the west, you can see the magnificent Khelleva Mansion. There appears to be no entrance to the Mansion from this road, but you do see another small road running northwest from the Overland Drive Intersection.
